objectives.en: Active participation in a philosophy conference and reflection upon
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on aktiivne osalemine filosoofiakonverentsil ja

objectives.en: the process of participating in the conference.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the course, participants have an experience of
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinud üliõpilane omab mitmepäevasel filosoofiakonverentsil

learning_outcomes.en: participating at a philosophy conference and are able to reflect upon
learning_outcomes.et: osalemise kogemust ja oskab konverentsil osalemise protsessi üle

learning_outcomes.en: the process of participating at a conference.

independent_work.et:
NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Attending all the presentations and/or presenting yourself
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at the conference?" (1-2 pp)

Frege Lectures 2024:
* Participating at all the lectures/seminars (Frege Lectures 2024)
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at Frege lectures?" (1-2 pp)

description.et:
NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Attending all the presentations and/or presenting yourself

NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at the conference?" (1-2 pp)
Please send your essays to Francesco Orsi (francesco.orsi@ut.ee).
Essay deadline: 25.09.2024

Frege Lectures 2024 (November 4-6) held by Emma Borg (London)
* Attending all the lectures

Frege Lectures 2024 (November 4-6)
Writing a small essay "What did I learn at Frege lectures?" (1-2 pp)
Please send your essays to Bruno Mölder (bruno.moelder@ut.ee).
Essay deadline: 15.11.2024

grade_evaluation.et: Based on your attendance/presentation and essay.

debt_elimination.et: If you missed the conference... Wait for the next one.

resources.mandatory_materials:
* NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Attending all the presentations and/or presenting yourself
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at the conference?" (1-2 pp)
See more details at: https://sites.google.com/view/nordphil/home

* Frege Lectures 2024 (November 4-6)  held by Emma Borg (London)
See more details at: https://filsem.ut.ee/en/content/frege-lectures
Compulsory reading materials can be found at Moodle.
